channel.title: Posts on UCR PostdocAssoc
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on UCR PostdocAssoc

item.title: Research Integrity Series
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: The Research Ethics Education program and the Office of Research and Economic Development invite the postdoctoral community to the 2022-2023 Research Integrity Series, where recent NIH and upcoming NSF changes to requirements for education in the responsible conduct of research will be discussed. All sessions will be held at 2:00 pm and are free and open to the public via Zoom. Link to be provided in advance of each session.

item.title: General Assembly
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: The UCR Postdoctoral Association invites all postdoctoral and visiting scholars and project scientists to the first General Assembly of the 2022-2023 term on September 23, 2022, at 11:30 am at the UCR Botanic Gardens conference room . Get to know the new board and the current projects and initiatives and share your ideas to strengthen our community. No registration required!

item.title: National Postdoc Appreciation Week
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description:
Join us in celebrating the National Postdoc Appreciation Week through multiple events organized by the Graduate Division and the UC Riverside Postdoctoral Association. Looking forward to seeing you all this week!

‎

item.title: Botanic Gardens Tour
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: Join us in celebrating the National Postdoc Appreciation Week with a gathering and a tour of the UCR Botanic Gardens on Friday, September 23, 2022, at 10:30 am. Please fill out this form to register. UCR Botanic Gardens

item.title: Graduate Writing Center Workshops
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: Attention postdocs and research staff! Are you applying for jobs? We are happy to announce a presentation on writing cover letters and research statements, brought to us by the Graduate Writing Center! Please join us (virtually) on Tuesday, December 14th from 4:30 to 5:30 pm. Please register here .

item.title: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Statement Workshop
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description: The RPA is pleased to host a presentation on how to craft a winning diversity, equity, and inclusion statement featuring Dr. David Lo (Senior Associate Dean for Research and Distinguished Professor of Biomedical Sciences) and Dr. Juliet McMullin (Professor of Anthropology). A strong DEI statement is a critical component of any competitive application, so don’t miss this chance to improve (or get started) on yours! Please join us (virtually) on Friday, December 10th, by registering here .
